data.title: Sean Penn, 59, Confirms He Married Leila George, 28, In a Zoom Ceremony
data.meta_description: On Friday, the couple's friend took to her Instagram to write a heartfelt message announcing that the actor, 59, and actress, 28, tied the knot recently.
data.text:
"Let's say there are socially liberating factors under COVID," the Oscar winner joked.

UPDATE: 8/4/2020 6:53AM

Sean Penn confirmed he married Leila George at their home on Thursday with the help of a virtual meeting app.

During Monday's appearance on "Late Night with Seth Meyers," the Oscar winner, 59, revealed he said "I do" for the third time, as he wed the 28-year-old actress in a small ceremony.

"We did a COVID wedding," the "Milk" actor explained. "By that, I mean it was a county commissioner on Zoom and we were at the house with my two children and her brother, and we did it that way."

After host Seth Meyers said the event "actually sounds pretty nice and low stress," Penn agreed, joking, "Let's say there are socially liberating factors under COVID."

ORIGINAL STORY: 8/01/2020 1:23PM

Congratulations are in order for Sean Penn and Leila George, according to their friend.

On Friday, Irena Medavoy took to her Instagram to write a heartfelt message announcing that the actor, 59, and actress, 28, tied the knot recently.

"We are so happy for @leilageorge #seanpenn getting married. We love you," the wife of "Black Swan" producer Mike Medavoy wrote alongside snaps of the couple, including one showing off a pair of gold wedding rings.

"We are over the moon to [see you] find your soulmate true partner," Irena continued. "You are meant to be together. God Bless you both and the family you have joined. Introducing the Pennâ€™s #marriage."

Josh Brolin posted a series of hearts in the comments section, as Rosanna Arquette wrote, "Wonderful. ðŸŽ¶ Love and light."

Sean and Leila -- who is the daughter of "Law & Order" star Vincent Dâ€™Onofrio -- have been romantically linked since 2016.

Back in March, the couple were spotted at a benefit for Australia wildfire relief efforts in Los Angeles.

Getty

Charlize Theron Opens Up About Dating Sean Penn, If They Were Going To Get Married

View Story

"It's the most important thing [to have his support]. I wouldnâ€™t be here smiling today if it wasn't for him," Leila told People at the time.

And during a stop on "The Howard Stern Show" in June, the Oscar winner referred to Leila as "the gal in my life."

Sean was previously married to Robin Wright from 1996 to 2010. He was also married to Madonna from 1985 to 1989.
